mapper.insert: insert into mymember(mem_id, mem_pass, mem_name, mem_tel, mem_addr, mem_photo) values(#{mem_id}, #{mem_pass}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_tel}, #{mem_addr}, #{mem_photo})
mapper.update: update mymember set mem_pass = #{mem_pass}, mem_name = #{mem_name}, mem_tel = #{mem_tel}, mem_addr = #{mem_addr}, mem_photo = #{mem_photo} where mem_id = #{mem_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from mymember where mem_id = #{mem_id}
